remarks: If two lattice elements that cover a third are comparable, then they are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2012.)
statement:
cvrcmp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrcmp.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrcmp.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrcmp $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ ( Z C X /\ Z C Y ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> X = Y ) ) $.
